DataElement.preferredName: Study Time Point Description Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A statement that represents a specific point in the time continuum of research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects.  [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care._A statement that represents a specific point in the time continuum of research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects.  [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Concepts.definition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
